snippet: Speaker John A. Boehner posted a holiday greeting on Thursday, a video poem title “Happy Christmas to All,” although the Speaker’s wishes may not extend all the way to the White House.
abstract: Speaker John A. Boehner posted a holiday greeting on Thursday, a video poem title “Happy Christmas to All,” although the Speaker’s wishes may not extend all the way to the White House.

headline.main: A John Boehner Christmas: Verse for Verse
